snippet.title: First Dwarf - Official 'Wishlist Now' Trailer | Realms Deep 2023
snippet.description:
First Dwarf is an RPG adventure tower defense game developed by Star Drifters. Players can get into their very own mech, explore the massive world to build a base, and take on dangerous enemies. First Dwarf launching on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series S|X, Nintendo Switch, and PC with the ability to Wishlist the game on Steam available now.

#FirstDwarf
